column4: anyone know why moving large files from hd to another would lag out Ubuntu 9.04 jaunty?
as in, make the system non responsive?
there'se an interresting question.. I was moving an svk repository, like 200.000 small files.. immediately, the system was non responsivev.. even the mouse went haywire..
can't tell you, really what could cause it.. i've seen it myself as well.. if you find out, please do let me know
